Attribute.Name: Action
Attribute.Description: Indicates the action that can be perfomed on the load. The valid values for Action are Create, Modify, Create-Modify, Delete or Void(blanks). In case when Action is Void, it is treated as Create-Modify.

Attribute.Name: CreateOneLoadPerShipment
Attribute.Description: Indicates if each shipment should be converted into a separate load. Valid values are Y, N and Void. Void implies N.

Attribute.Name: DocumentType
Attribute.Description: This attribute cannot be modified once the Load is created.

Attribute.Name: DropAtShipmentDestination
Attribute.Description: This attribute cannot be modified once the Load is created. Valid values are Y, N and Void. Void implies Y.

Attribute.Name: EnterpriseCode
Attribute.Description: This attribute cannot be modified once the Load is created.

Attribute.Name: GenerateBolNo
Attribute.Description: Indicates if BOL needs to be generated for load. Valid values are Y, N and Void. Void implies N.

Attribute.Name: IsExpInclInManifest
Attribute.Description:
Applicable when adding a load to manifest. When passed as Y then the containers in the load and shipments belonging to this manifest need not be manifested explicitly. When passed as N or Void then all the containers in the load and shipments should be manifested before closing the manifest.
Valid Values: Y, N, or Void
Default: N
If IsExpInclInManifest is modified from N to Y , then no load or shipment container should be included the manifest.

Attribute.Name: OverrideModificationRules
Attribute.Description: OverrideModificationRules is used to override the statuses defined in the modfication rules. Valid values are Y, N and Void. Void implies N.

Attribute.Name: OwnerOrganizationCode
Attribute.Description: This attribute cannot be modified once the Load is created.

Attribute.Name: PickupFromShipmentOrigin
Attribute.Description: This attribute cannot be modified once the Load is created. Valid values are Y, N and Void. Void implies Y.

Attribute.Name: RemoveFromManifest
Attribute.Description: RemoveFromManifest is applicable only when the Load is manifested. When passed as Y then load and shipments belonging to this manifest will be removed from the manifest if none of the containers of the load or shipment is already manifested. Valid values are Y, N and Void. Void implies N.

Attribute.Name: RemoveShipmentsOnDelete
Attribute.Description: RemoveShipmentsOnDelete is applicable only when the Action is Delete. The system by default deletes only empty loads or in other words, a load with no shipments included in it. However, if you wish to delete a load even if it comprises of shipments, set this attribute to Y. Valid values are Y, N and Void. Void implies N.

Description.div: This node is not mandatory. If passed, it should point to a SCAC and Service on the system. It is used to default Scac, CarrierServiceCode and Shipmode on Load.

LoadShipmentKey or ShipmentKey attribute or Shipment node must be passed. LoadShipment will be picked up from Shipment's ShipNode if PickupFromShipmentOrigin is Y . Otherwise, it will be picked up from Load's origin. Shipment's drop off stop is similarly determined based on DropAtShipmentDestination attribute. If a LoadStop (Pickup/Drop) does not exist for the LoadShipment, then the system automatically creates a new LoadStop at the Shipment's ShipNode or destination address as required.

Attribute.Name: Action
Attribute.Description: Indicates the action that can be perfomed on the load shipment. The valid values for Action are Delete or Void(blanks). In case when Action is Void, it is treated as Create-Modify.

Description.div:
Either LoadStopKey attribute or StopNode attribute or StopAddressKey attribute or StopAddress node must be passed.
If LoadStop already exists it will be modified (deleted if Action is Delete), otherwise a new record will be created.
In the identification of an existing LoadStop, if both StopNode and StopAddress information are passed, StopNode information will be used. Only if node is not passed will StopAddress information be used.

Attribute.Name: Action
Attribute.Description: Indicates the action that can be perfomed on the load stop. The valid values for Action are Delete or Void(blanks). In case when Action is Void, it is treated as Create-Modify.

Description.div:
This attribute allows for sequencing of stops. However, if a stop is of StopType
O or D then these stops have to be the first and last stop in the stop sequence respectively. The system implicitly assigns StopSequenceNo -1 to the Origin Stop and 99999 to the Destination Stop.
If Intermediate Stops have any number not between -1 and 99999.

Valid Values: O, I, or D
Default: I
If PickupFromShipmentOrigin is N , then a LoadStop with StopType
O must be passed.
LoadShipmentChargeKey or ChargeCategory, ChargeName, PayeeOrganizationCode, KeyReference1, KeyReference2 must be passed to identify existing charges.

Attribute.Name: Action
Attribute.Description: Indicates the action that can be perfomed on the load charges. The valid values for Action are Delete or Void(blanks). In case when Action is Void, it is treated as Create-Modify.

Description.div: InstructionDetailKey or InstructionType and SequenceNo must be passed.

Attribute.Name: Action
Attribute.Description: Indicates the action that can be perfomed on the instruction. The valid values for Action are Delete or Void(blanks). In case when Action is Void, it is treated as Create-Modify. If action is Delete then InstructionDetailKey is mandatory.

Description.div:
ARRIVAL and DEPARTURE (being system-defined date types) can be passed at LoadStop element as ExpectedDepartureDate and ActualDepartureDate and as ExpectedArrivalDate and ActualArrivalDate or at AdditionalDate element for DateTypeId ARRIVAL or DEPARTURE
System defined dates, passed as attributes in LoadStop element, overrides these dates passed at AdditionalDate element.
System defined dates are stored as Load's attributes.
Custom defined dates are stored as additional dates associated with the Load.

Attribute.Name: Action
Attribute.Description: Indicates the action that can be perfomed on the additional dates associated with the load. The valid values for Action are Delete or Void(blanks). In case when Action is Void, it is treated as Create-Modify.

Description.div: Optional. Stores hold type information. Multiple HoldTypes can be applied/ removed for a single Load.

The code identifying the hold type to be applied/ removed for a Load.
HoldType must be defined in the configuration

This attribute specifies the status of the Load hold type.
Valid Values:
1100 - To apply a HoldType to Load.
1200 - To reject a HoldType from Load.
1300 - To resolve a HoldType from Load.
Default: Hold type is always created in '1100' status.
